students.name: Nguyen Ngoc Anh

bio.address: Dam San Village- Minh Quang- Ba Vi- Ha Noi

students.story: Ngoc Anh, her mother, and her three siblings live in a small rundown house next to a new home built from borrowed money. Her father passed away from a fatal disease. A construction debt of about 60 million VND ($2700) is a burden on the shoulders of a young mother and children who have just lost a father. In addition to working in the fields and tending to pigs, Huong, Ngoc Anh's mother, also works for hire but she still is not able to make enough to support her kids and make monthly payments. Although Ngoc Anh is young, she already knows how to help her mother with fieldwork and tend to livestock. She always gives 100% effort into her studies and is named an honor student every year.

detail.title: Pig Farming for Reproduction
reason: Huong, Ngoc Anh's mother, already has many years of experience in tending to pigs and their reproduction.
The occupation does not take too much time and is efficient in bringing in profits.
detail.profitSpendingPlan: To pay for schooling and living costs of family members, and pay back a debt of 60 million VND that came from building a house.

students.name: Le Khanh Duong

bio.address: Moc  village - Minh Quang – Ba Vì- Ha Noi

students.story: Duong and his parents live in a small chamber in their paternal grandmother’s home. His father has been handicapped since Duong's childhood, and getting through daily life is a struggle. His mother has just gone through a time of extreme hardship. The wellbeing of his family is a heavy burden on the shoulders of an eighth grade student. The four family members depend on one acre of farmland and one cow that Duong tends to daily for food. Duong has been an advanced student every academic year.

detail.title: Raising Chickens For Collecting Eggs.
reason: It is fitting for the parents, given their health status.
Makes fast profits if the chickens are taken care of well.
There is also the advantage of already having barns for the chickens.
detail.profitSpendingPlan: To pay for schooling for their child Le Khanh Duong, to have better daily meals, to get medical services for mom and dad.

students.name: Khuat Thi Tham

bio.address: Cam Yen - Thach That - Ha Noi

students.story: Since both parents passed away due to illness, the sisters have been cared for by their grandparents. The low-income family lives in an agricultural village. Their youngest son (the sisters’ uncle) also passed away and left behind three young children. The grandparents have suffered the pain of losing three children while working hard to raise five grandchildren. Thắm and Tươi both study well at school.

detail.title: Raising Chickens For Collecting Eggs.
reason: The family members can take part in this project.
It takes a short time to produce eggs, which will be collected and sold daily to generate income.
detail.profitSpendingPlan: 1) Invest in the model (buy new chickens) 2) Pay for education expenses.

students.name: Khuat Thi Tuoi

bio.address: Cam Yen - Thach That - Ha Noi

students.story: Since both parents passed away due to illness, the sisters have been cared for by their grandparents. The low-income family lives in an agricultural village. Their youngest son (the sisters’ uncle) also passed away and left behind three young children. The grandparents have suffered the pain of losing three children while working hard to raise five grandchildren. Thắm and Tươi both study well at school.

detail.title: Raising Chickens For Collecting Eggs.
reason: The family members can take part in this project.
It takes a short time to produce eggs, which will be collected and sold daily to generate income.
detail.profitSpendingPlan: 1) Invest in the model (buy new chickens) 2) Pay for education expenses.

students.name: Nguyen Thi Phuong Thu

bio.address: Trach Loi - Trach My Loc -  Phuc Tho - Ha Noi

students.story: After her parents divorced, Phương Thư lived by herself. She is currently being taken care of by her grandparents. Her grandfather has lung cancer, and her grandmother works hard on the family farm. Additionally, her grandmother borrows money from relatives to raise Phương Thư and take care of the grandfather. Phương Thư attends school in the morning and works on the farm with her grandma in the afternoon. Despite her long and tiring schedule, Phương Thư always studies hard and earns excellent grades each year.

detail.title: Raising Chickens For Collecting Eggs.
reason: Family members can take part in this model.
The grandfather has experience in raising chickens.
The model generates profits quickly with high economic efficiency.
detail.profitSpendingPlan: 1) Invest in this model (buying new chickens). 2) Pay for education fees of VND 4.400.000/year and other education related expenses. 3) Pay for medical expenses for the grandfather.

students.name: Nguyen Thi Hong Hoa

bio.address: Trach My Loc - Phuc Tho - Ha Noi

students.story: Hoa's mother passed away during childbirth. Her father works in other provinces and comes home for only 2-3 days a year before leaving again.  Hoa and her brother, Nguyễn Khắc Long, are now being cared for by their disabled aunt. Although their aunt has limited mobility, she has to travel 15 km to earn income as a dish washer. Although Hoa's brother passed an entrance exam to a university in Hanoi, but he could not afford the high cost of  living and studying in the large city. Instead, he chose to study at a university in Thai Nguyen province, which is closer to home. Hoa is physically smaller (due to lack of nutrition) than her friends but she has a strong will to live and study. She wishes to become a doctor in the future.

detail.title: Raising chickens for meat and eggs.
reason: Ms. Vui has experience raising chicken.
This will generate income quickly for the family.
detail.profitSpendingPlan: 1) Invest in the model (buying new chickens) 2) Pay for living expenses of the family and education expenses for the children.
